queries.item: CREATE TABLE ?:mcs_child_shops ( `child_shop_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `domain` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `status` char(1) NOT NULL default 'A', PRIMARY KEY (`child_shop_id`), KEY `status` (`status`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;
ALTER TABLE ?:products ADD `mcs_child_sync_product` char(1) NOT NULL default 'Y'
ALTER TABLE ?:products ADD `mcs_child_sync_images` char(1) NOT NULL default 'Y'
ALTER TABLE ?:products ADD `mcs_child_sync_files` char(1) NOT NULL default 'Y'
ALTER TABLE ?:products ADD `mcs_child_shops_domains` text NOT NULL
ALTER TABLE ?:product_descriptions ADD `mcs_child_product` varchar(255) NOT NULL default ''
ALTER TABLE ?:product_descriptions ADD `mcs_child_full_description` mediumtext NOT NULL
